CustomField.description: Field to check if the batch process need to be checked the record or not.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(AV_ExternalID__c), 'NoToBeProcess', IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(AV_ExternalID__c)), OR( ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Pendiente no localizado'), ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Pendiente'), ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Open') ) ), 'ToBeProcess', AV_ExternalID__c ) )
CustomField.label: Proceso Batch - Cambio Estado
